doc:
Tony Hale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Hale 0 Anthony Hale (born September 30, 1970) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for his role in the Fox comedy series Arrested Development as the neurotic Buster Bluth. Since 2012, he has played Gary Walsh on the HBO comedy Veep, for which he won the 2013 and 2015 Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series. Anthony_Hale ( born September_30_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor_and_comedian . He is_known for his_role in the_Fox_comedy_series_Arrested_Development as the_neurotic_Buster_Bluth . Since 2012 , he has_played Gary_Walsh on the_HBO_comedy_Veep , for which he won the_2013_and_2015_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Comedy_Series .
